resources.string:
WebXpose is a tiny Web Server app.
 It allows you to expose files in your sdcard to other users.
 Choose the site name, the server port and the admin port, then you must choose a folder inside your sdcard.
 You can share the entire sdcard, but it is not advisable.
 To start the server, click on the "start" button. And, to stop the server, click on the "stop" button.
 More help is available in the project Wiki, which can be found in the link bellow.
